definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street

sentences.english: The development and utilization of tideland shall be subject to comprehensive planning and strict administration.
sentences.chinese: 海塗的開發利用應當全面規劃，加強管理。

sentences.english: At last, principles of resources exploitation and the pattern of agriculture ecology of tideland are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了萊州市海塗資源開發的原則與農業生態模式。
